title: Windows 8 AIO x64 x86 18in1 en-US Pre-Activated

Windows 8 AIO x64 18in1 en-US Pre-Activated Jul2013

This will NOT fit on a 4.37GiB Single-Layer DVDR
Use a Dual-Layer DVDR or an 16GB+ USB flash drive.

murphy78 presents Windows 8 AIO 18in1 x64 en-US DaRT8 Jul2013
Contains KB files to bring setup current to July9-2013 patch date

No Windows 8 Settings were harmed in the making of this ISO.
No Programs are added to Windows.
No Registry Settings were modified.
No Unattended Settings were added to the ISO.

64-bit MSDN Sources:
en_windows_8_enterprise_n_x64_dvd_918052.iso
en_windows_8_enterprise_x64_dvd_917522.iso
en_windows_8_n_x64_dvd_916091.iso
en_windows_8_pro_n_vl_x64_dvd_918677.iso
en_windows_8_pro_vl_x64_dvd_917699.iso
en_windows_8_x64_dvd_915440.iso

These RTM Sources are the final Build 9200

Installation Indexes:
Windows 8 (Core) 64-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 (Core) N 64-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 Pro 64-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 ProWMC 64-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 Pro N 64-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 Pro VL 64-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 Pro N VL 64-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 Enterprise 64-bit / KMS-Activated
Windows 8 Enterprise N 64-bit KMS-Activated

(Core) and ProWMC versions of KMS Activation are not
officially supported by Microsoft, so use them at your
own risk. They default to 30-day activation instead of
the normal 180-day period. All KMS-Activated Indexes
will auto-renew indefinitely as long as you do not
install any kb file that blocks the service or if you
install a security program without allowing the
activation traffic and program through the firewall.

setupcomplete.cmd phase:
KB2772501 (online only IEPropSchema update)
KB2821895 (Servicing Stack Update)
SC Config and SC Create if KMS-Activated index
reg add runonce cleanup script if KMS-Activated index

Features:
-Non-Activated indexes and KMS-Activated indexes
KMS-Activated indexes will Activate before first logon and
renew activation every 7 days.
-Recent Windows Updates included for extra security
-Included notes from my KMS-SS for Office activation
and other information. You do not need to read to use.

Changes from recent Windows 8 AIO releases:
-Removed Net3 and the associated kb files from offline integration
-New servicing stack KB file online install and reboot
-No setupcomplete malicious software tool or defender updates
(speeds up installs and saves a few hundred megs)
-Removed DaRT8 (also few hundred megs)
-Added small folder named Tools on the iso with 3 small scripts
-added EFI boot data to the ISO. You should be able to boot both EFI and Non-EFI



Credits:
CODYQX4 - KMS Server Service (Activator)
murphy78 - Integration, testing, and ISO design

Enjoy Pirates,
murphy78[/b]
